CustomField.description: Formula field with a graphical indicator of Contracting Language
CustomField.formula: CASE( Contracting_Language__c, "English", IMAGE("/resource/flag_British", "Preferred Language = English"), "Dutch", IMAGE("/resource/flag_NL", "Preferred Language = Dutch"), "French", IMAGE("/resource/Flag_France", "Preferred Language = French"), "German", IMAGE("/resource/flag_German", "Preferred Language = German"), "" )
CustomField.label: Contracting Language Flag
